page.title: 09FEATURES PAST & PRESENT
page.content: 4 metres of the poles which shows the ground is sinking. At first people used to pump the water out with wind pumps,then steam,diesel and now electricity is used. Lots of old things have been found in the Fens like old Neolithic houses nearly 6000 years old, arrow heads, spear heads,axeheads and old flints. In about 40 years the farming will not be very good round Outwell because much of the peat will have gone and we will be left with clay. The capital of the Fens is the town of Wisbech.
